texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["You can get a refund if you have been charged for touching in and out at the same station without making a journey."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
We aim to automatically refund you for a same station exit if you have not had one in the last 7 days.
If you haven't received an automatic refund after 48 hours, you can submit a claim for a refund on your contactless and Oyster account:
You can submit a claim for a refund , or call us on 0343 222 1234 ( charges may apply ) - open 08:00 - 20:00, 7 days a week
